file.original: Example Add Formatted Text to SO Confirmation.htm

external-file.href: Example Add Formatted Text to SO Confirmation.htm.skl

trans-unit.source: Example – Add Formatted Text to Sales Order Confirmation

seg-source.mrk: Example – Add Formatted Text to Sales Order Confirmation

trans-unit.source: In this example, special formatted text from cc|formatted documents is added to the cc|text module header, footer and lines in a new sales order through manual entry, opening of an HTML file and import of an image.

seg-source.mrk: In this example, special formatted text from cc|formatted documents is added to the cc|text module header, footer and lines in a new sales order through manual entry, opening of an HTML file and import of an image.

trans-unit.source: For this example, a new Text Module Print Management was created for usage with Sales Order Confirmations.

seg-source.mrk: For this example, a new Text Module Print Management was created for usage with Sales Order Confirmations.

trans-unit.source: : Text Module Print Management setup for use with Order Confirmation documents

seg-source.mrk: : Text Module Print Management setup for use with Order Confirmation documents

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The picture attached to item 1920-S, ANTWERP Conference Table has been deleted for this example.

seg-source.mrk: The picture attached to item 1920-S, ANTWERP Conference Table has been deleted for this example.

trans-unit.source: Create a Sales Order and Add Header Text

seg-source.mrk: Create a Sales Order and Add Header Text

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a Sales Order and add header text:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create a Sales Order and add header text:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Home > Sales Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Home > Sales Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER or TAB.

trans-unit.source: In the Sell-to Customer No. field, enter 01454545.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sell-to Customer No.
field, enter 01454545.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Header Texts.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Header Texts.

trans-unit.source: : Edit Text page for header text

seg-source.mrk: : Edit Text page for header text

trans-unit.source: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: In the first line of the Text Editor window, type “Dear Ms. McDonald,”.

seg-source.mrk: In the first line of the Text Editor window, type “Dear Ms. McDonald,”.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER twice and then type “We are pleased to receive your order. Our logistic department will get in contact with you soon to arrange the delivery terms.”

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER twice and then type “We are pleased to receive your order.
Our logistic department will get in contact with you soon to arrange the delivery terms.”

trans-unit.source: Highlight the words “delivery terms” and then click the Bold icon on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Highlight the words “delivery terms” and then click the Bold icon on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Header text with formatting added to sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Header text with formatting added to sales order

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Text Editor.
The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text. If the “Word Processing (with Line Conversion)” function had been used, the formatted text would have been converted into cc|text module text lines that can be printed without the cc|formatted documents report renderer, but is thereby losing its formatting.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Text Editor.
The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text.

If the “Word Processing (with Line Conversion)” function had been used, the formatted text would have been converted into cc|text module text lines that can be printed without the cc|formatted documents report renderer, but is thereby losing its formatting.

trans-unit.source: In the Print Mgt. Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

trans-unit.source: : Header text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

seg-source.mrk: : Header text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

trans-unit.source: Add Footer Text to Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: Add Footer Text to Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add footer text to the Sales Order:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add footer text to the Sales Order:

trans-unit.source: On the Navigate tab, click Footer Texts.

seg-source.mrk: On the Navigate tab, click Footer Texts.

trans-unit.source: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: On the Start tab, click the Open File icon.

seg-source.mrk: On the Start tab, click the Open File icon.

trans-unit.source: Locate and select the signature file. The text and signature from the file is added to the Text Editor. Notice that the file information appears in the status bar.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and select the signature file.
The text and signature from the file is added to the Text Editor.
Notice that the file information appears in the status bar.

trans-unit.source: : Signature File added to the footer text of the Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: : Signature File added to the footer text of the Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Text Editor. The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Text Editor.
The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text.

trans-unit.source: In the Print Mgt. Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

trans-unit.source: : Footer text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

seg-source.mrk: : Footer text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

trans-unit.source: Add Items, Graphic and Formatted Text to Sales Order Lines

seg-source.mrk: Add Items, Graphic and Formatted Text to Sales Order Lines

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add items, a graphic and formatted text to the Sales Order lines:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add items, a graphic and formatted text to the Sales Order lines:

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, enter a line for six units of item 1980-S to the BLUE location.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, enter a line for six units of item 1980-S to the BLUE location.

trans-unit.source: Go to the next line and enter one unit of item 1920-S to the BLUE location.

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter one unit of item 1920-S to the BLUE location.

trans-unit.source: With the line selected for item 1920-S, click Line > Line Texts on the Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: With the line selected for item 1920-S, click Line > Line Texts on the Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing.

seg-source.mrk: In the Edit Text page, click Word Processing.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click the Insert tab and then click Image.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click the Insert tab and then click Image.

trans-unit.source: Locate and insert the graphic of the ANTWERP Conference Table.

seg-source.mrk: Locate and insert the graphic of the ANTWERP Conference Table.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click the Start tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click the Start tab.

trans-unit.source: Go to the next line and type “Both practical and stylish, this all-in-one table is professional enough for meetings, durable enough for luncheons. Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care. Adjustable levelling glides help compensate for uneven floors.”

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and type “Both practical and stylish, this all-in-one table is professional enough for meetings, durable enough for luncheons.
Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care.
Adjustable levelling glides help compensate for uneven floors.”

trans-unit.source: Highlight the “Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care” text and then click the Fore Color icon on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Highlight the “Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care” text and then click the Fore Color icon on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: In the fifth column, select the purplish-blue color in the second row from the bottom and then click the Bold icon on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: In the fifth column, select the purplish-blue color in the second row from the bottom and then click the Bold icon on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER twice and then type “Features”.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER twice and then type “Features”.

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER.

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER.

trans-unit.source: In the ribbon, click the Unordered List icon and then type “All-in-one table is professional enough for meetings, durable enough for luncheons”

seg-source.mrk: In the ribbon, click the Unordered List icon and then type “All-in-one table is professional enough for meetings, durable enough for luncheons”

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER and then type “Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care”

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER and then type “Abrasion- and stain-resistant laminate wipes clean for easy care”

trans-unit.source: Press ENTER and then type “Adjustable levelling glides help compensate for uneven floors”

seg-source.mrk: Press ENTER and then type “Adjustable levelling glides help compensate for uneven floors”

trans-unit.source: Highlight the “Features” text above the bulleted list, click the Heading icon on the ribbon and then select Heading 3.

seg-source.mrk: Highlight the “Features” text above the bulleted list, click the Heading icon on the ribbon and then select Heading 3.

trans-unit.source: : Line text with formatting added to sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Line text with formatting added to sales order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Text Editor. The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Text Editor.
The text line information appears in the Edit Text page as Embedded Text.

trans-unit.source: In the Print Mgt. Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

seg-source.mrk: In the <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code field, enter S-ORDERS.

trans-unit.source: : Line text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

seg-source.mrk: : Line text and Print Management Code for the Sales Order Confirmation added to Edit Text page

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Edit Text page.

trans-unit.source: Run the Formatted Documents Order Confirmation Report

seg-source.mrk: Run the Formatted Documents Order Confirmation Report

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to run the Formatted Documents Order Confirmation report:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to run the Formatted Documents Order Confirmation report:

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon of the Sales Order, click Actions > Print Confirmation.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon of the Sales Order, click Actions > Print Confirmation.

trans-unit.source: In the report request page, set the Document Layout No. to OC-01-TM.

seg-source.mrk: In the report request page, set the Document Layout No.
to OC-01-TM.

trans-unit.source: : DC - Order Confirmation report request page

seg-source.mrk: : DC - Order Confirmation report request page

trans-unit.source: Click OK to run a preview of the report.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to run a preview of the report.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Order Confirmation document with formatted header, line and footer text

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Order Confirmation document with formatted header, line and footer text
